I really appreciate all the posts on the Nobuiye question.
Jim -- I'll go t=
o Nakamura and look for what you recommended and 
correlate it with Torigoy=
e/Haynes' notes on the generations (I have the 
copy Craig Harris had) then=
 fit it together with the Tsuba Geijutsu.

easy.  I was hoping there might be a

n you have time I'd appreciate the file -- much thanks!
